CustomField.description: Enter the list of fields from the product object displayed on the revalidation product dialog. Each field API name may be separated either by a comma or by a new line.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the list of fields from the product object displayed on the revalidation product dialog. Each field API name may be separated either by a comma or by a new line.
CustomField.label: Revalidation Product Columns
